title: Breakingviews TV: Jack’s trades
text:
Breakingviews TV: Jack’s trades 8:58pm IST - 04:52 
Alibaba founder Jack Ma has built an e-commerce juggernaut but made plenty of dubious side-bets along the way. Robyn Mak and Quentin Webb look at why taking 33 pct of affiliate Ant Financial, a giant in payments and wealth management, is more promising. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Alibaba founder Jack Ma has built an e-commerce juggernaut but made plenty of dubious side-bets along the way. Robyn Mak and Quentin Webb look at why taking 33 pct of affiliate Ant Financial, a giant in payments and wealth management, is more promising.
